overview: Larry is a pet dealer who's seeing Moe's wife while at the same time trying to steal Joe's fianc√©e. When Moe's become suspicious, Larry attempts to frame Joe as the boyfriend. Larry's plan backfires when Joe catches him and lets Moe deliver some punishment.
tagline: Larrys a philanderer in love with Joes fiance and Moes wife.
title: Triple Crossed
